title: champs like old morde?
body:
I know old morde was very unique, but he was by far my favorite champ to play because of the amount of brute force he had in all stages of the game. After the rework, he just feels like another generic juggernaut with no interesting features. What other champions have a feel when playing them similar to old morde? I know he was one of a kind but im looking for the closest i can get.

Edit: I've given up on this thread. I have gotten a SINGLE actual response and other than that it was just people insulting me for liking old morde. I wish people would actually answer my question instead of just wasting my time.

replies.body: i love when i have a serious question and the only responses i get are things like this

Hey, the joke was too easy to pass up. :P

Honestly? I can't really think of anything quite like old Morde. I guess you could try Mundo?
Give me old morde with new morde model and visuals
Old morde had lit no downtime on his busted Q damage.

New Morde is more so what Mordekaiser was meant to be, the 2015 GU was a mistake admitted by the devs.

I respected your opinion with prefering the 2015 version, but I prefered the actual old Mordekaiser and this new iteration is more in line with that.

{{champion:75}} {{champion:83}} are the most similar. They're both more focused on split pushing but they require the same game knowledge that morde did. 

{{champion:57}} {{champion:111}} If you built bruiser AP hybrid Maokai/Naut they might be similar? but they're still kinda more on the tank side

What was unique about old morde? You just pressed attack-move and facerolled your keyboard until you hear someone get a shutdown, which depends entirely on who bought boots first.

Lots of champs can do that still with an equal lack of interaction, mechanics, ect: {{champion:36}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:48}}

You seem to have forgotten the entire adc roster. Trundle relies on Running around the enemy for superior positioning while using the pillar to bounce them to help that. If mundo doesnt have any interactive mechanics with his cleaver then either does champions like Xerath or brand.
